name: InadequateHousingInterventionsSNOMEDCT
title: Inadequate Housing Interventions SNOMED CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represent interventions for Inadequate Housing as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: In the FHIR Procedure and ServiceRequest resources, these values may be used for Procedure.code and ServiceRequest.code (e.g., for the SDOHCC Procedure and ServiceRequest profiles in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT interventions for Inadequate Housing as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes included in the "Cross-Domains Interventions SNOMED CT" Value Set.)

Assessment of goals to achieve adequate housing (procedure)
Assessment of progress toward goals to achieve adequate housing (procedure)
Coordination of resources to address inadequate housing (procedure)
